body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting us. My name is John Martin and I am from City Stays Hotel. May I ask for your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Sara. Can you please provide me with your room number and the last four digits of your booking reference for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my room number is two zero four and the last four digits of my booking reference are eight five seven two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for the information, Sara. One more question, could you verify your check-in date and the number of nights you are staying with us, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I checked in on the third of June and I'm staying for five nights.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for confirming, Sara. I will look into the issue with your noisy neighbors. We aim to resolve this promptly.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, I appreciate it. It's been quite frustrating.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Your comfort is our priority, Sara. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We'll have this resolved soon. Thank you for your time.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, John. I look forward to a peaceful stay. Goodbye.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Goodbye, Sara. Have a pleasant day.
